mainSequence.step: User A triggers Tx HasKeychainEntryV1 request.
API Client sends a request to API Server.
API Server sends a set(key, value) request to AWS SM.
AWS SM sets the key-value pair.
AWS SM invokes awsClient to get the AWS Client.
AWS SM confirms to API must proceed.
API Server responds affirmatively via AWS SM.
API Server responds a message to API Client to prepare to Receive Response.
API Client Responds by solving it accordingly checking all resources saved.
Proceed the Get Successful KeychainConfirmation details.
